notes:
Game launches fine, however it cannot connect to online servers, rendering most of the game unplayable. Quickplay seems to work, played a few minutes of a game with my controller, though I did not test extensively, and there may have been some audio volume issues as well.

Network issues seem to be related to this bug:
https://github.com/ValveSoftware/Proton/issues/162
title: NBA 2K19
